title: Yo can we have ELO take into account itemization?
body:
Like MR stacking Rammus vs Jarv Jungle, AP Teemo top, Blitz with Mercurial at the end and a Riven mid and Varus bot?

And like the Lee Sin with Ruby Sightstone 55 minutes in, a Youmuu's, Cinderhulk, maw and Randuin's.

Dude it's embarrassing when the enemy team can itemise and my team has 2 members with retarded itemisation and losing actually costs me anything since it's like a clear loss from level 1 tbh. 90% of the time.

replies.body: But what about all those games that you win because the enemy team itemised stupidly? Should you gain anything from them?
If only ELO took into account attitude. Then you'd be bronze 5

> [{quoted}](name=McRuthless,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=keeNOzHn,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-12-13T21:35:12.287+0000)
>
> If only ELO took into account attitude. Then you'd be bronze 5

http://www.wallpapersas.com/wallpapers/2013/02/Anime-Evangelion-2048x2560.jpeg

You could have it so that instead of losing rating you simply don't gain any if you lose, but Riot chose to be retards and use a Graph to display peoples rating instead of a ladder.

A system of gaining when you win and simply not gaining when you lose is a lot better than losing rating when you lose because then you are simply held back by noobs rather than punished by them and if you get repeated noobs rather than a decline, you're simply stalled in your climb which craps all over the concept of intentional feeders and a shoddy matchmaking system that is noob as f and has no idea what its doing when it repeatedly puts noobs on your team and chunks your rating, then they have the gall to go and add clamping to this furtherly indicating that they are retards.
People are abusive in Gold daily and if you wanna come in here and trash talk me because I think its unfair that bad players cost u rating you can go f urself.

Lee was abusive and then built like that which is embarrassing, because he acted like he had something- and he did- but what he had was sh-t building in general and his play wasn't much better.

Rammus just stacked a crap load of MR vs basically 3 heavy AD and 1 AP.

Dude that should not even cost me ELO. This is like a "How to train your Rammus" game and I'm punished when my untrained Rammus loses and the other aspect of the game was "Deal with a sh-t attitude Lee Sin with an equally sh-t build" and I'm punished when he turns out to do sh-t at the game and doubly punished in that he had the gall to open his mouth too.
But, but you're only in gold? Thats low elo bud
